title: Solar Wind and Suprathermal Ion Composition  Instrument, Key Parameters - S. T. Lepri (U of Michigan)

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/wind/sms/l2/stics_cdf/30min_erpa_solarwind/1995/wi_l2-30min_sms-stics-erpa-solarwind_19950101_v01.cdf. The most common cadence occurred for 14.8936% of the 7 timesteps. Cadence = 1935362 [ms] = PT32M15.362S.
info.contact: S. T. Lepri @ U of Michigan

parameters.name: ERPA_tc_hplus
parameters.description: Energy-resolved pitch-angle distributions triple coincidence H+

parameters.name: ERPA_tc_hplus_sum
parameters.description: Pitch-angle distributions triple coincidence H+ - summed over energy. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function spdf_sum_over_row (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['ERPA_tc_hplus']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
parameters.x_label: erpa tc H+ - summed over energy
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: erpa tc H+ - summed over energy
